This 'balance' identity you gained during that period is the strongest building block of success in every aspect of your life today. hepsi.simdi: Honey, you are currently in one of the wisest, most intuitive and most 'complete' periods of your life; The universe has worked out all the kinks for you! All the contradictions in your life reconcile, uncertainties result in unity with your vision, and you now feel complete. Whatever you intend today, there will be the love and support of a whole universe behind that intention. Just listen to your heart and enjoy this magnificent wholeness; Because you deserve this respect to the fullest.
hepsi.gelecek: Your future looks like a bright and collaborative path shaped by your loving and wise energy. You are entering a tremendous process in which everything in your life will flow like a river and you will wake up with a new reunion or success every day. A life awaits you where people admire your wisdom and compassion, and you heal the world with your honesty. The future will say to you 'to love and be loved will be your greatest achievement' and will greet you!

ask.gecmis: In the past, you have been so giving and such a 'victim' role in love that you eventually burned out trying to feed others while starving your own soul. Maybe you gave in to all your partner's emotional manipulations but didn't even get a 'thank you' in return. This 'inability to set boundaries' mistake at that time may prevent you from experiencing full self-confidence in your relationships even today. Those days when you left your own heart at the mercy of someone else still feel like an ache in your soul.
ask.simdi: My dear, there is a period of 'emotional confusion' and false calm in your love life right now; It's like your partner has forgotten your value! You doubt your own feelings so much that your world collapses when the other party makes the slightest mistake. This unrest inside you makes you passive-aggressive, or you reflect the storm inside you by saying 'everything is fine'. Today, we should look in that mirror honestly and ask 'why do I need someone else's approval?' You should ask; True love won't find you unless you love yourself.
ask.gelecek: The risk that awaits you in love in the future is that you may push your true soulmate away from you because of your excessive desire for control or your emotional instability. If you expect constant 'obedience' from your partner, you may be doomed to a relationship that is only on paper but dead in spirit. If you want true happiness in the future, you must learn to see love as harmony, not a show of power. Otherwise, your love life may always remain in the shadow of 'incompleteness'.

is.gecmis: You've been so 'too emotional' or 'vague' in your career that you didn't end up gaining the professional recognition you deserved. Maybe you trusted someone very much and entrusted your affairs to them, but those people took your success upon themselves. This 'naive' mistake at that time may have caused some people to approach you with distance and distrust in your professional life today. You learned in those days that success should come not only with love but also with strategy.
is.simdi: You are currently suffering from a 'discredit' and lack of motivation in your business life, honey; It's like all the work you've done has suddenly lost its value! Your decisions are inconsistent, and your energy confuses rather than motivates those around you. This can make you seem like an 'incompatible' or 'untrustworthy' manager at work. Instead of shouting with ambition these days, you should question why you feel so 'unsatisfied' and find that compassionate leader within yourself; Otherwise you will be pulled down from that peak.
is.gelecek: The danger that awaits you in your future business life may be sabotaging your own career due to over-sensitivity and inability to handle criticism. If you do not learn to cooperate but also set boundaries today, you may be left far behind your competitors and alone in the future. To protect your future success, you should not defend the logic of 'there is no room for emotions in business life', but the fact that 'only I can manage my emotions'. Otherwise, your career path may always remain at that 'nobody understands me' stop.

para.gecmis: Those 'emotional expenses' you made in the past on financial matters or the mistake of thinking money was a way of escape may have ruined your blessings today. That period you spent just filling that momentary inner emptiness instead of managing your money has made you more limited and anxious today. Maybe you lent money to someone and they didn't come back because you were too compassionate. This 'material illusion' at that time drags you into a state of unnecessary guilt every time you look at your wallet today.
para.simdi: You are currently in serious 'dissatisfaction' and chaos regarding your financial situation, my dear; You may have money, but even you can't keep track of where it goes! Even if a financial opportunity comes along, you run the risk of recoiling by saying 'it'll end anyway'. These days, when making financial decisions, you should act only with your logic, not your emotions, and learn to say 'no'; Otherwise, in this chaos, you may spend the last of your savings for the sake of others. To close that hole in your wallet, you must first end your hunger to be loved.
para.gelecek: The biggest risk that awaits you in your financial future may be experiencing a big loss in an investment you entered with overconfidence or thinking 'divine help will come'. If you do not learn financial discipline today and understand the fact that 'money does not measure success', you may always live with a feeling of 'inadequacy' financially in the future. If you want prosperity in the future, you must learn to use your financial power as a tool of power, not as a victim psychology. Otherwise, you may always live in fear of going bankrupt financially.

saglik.gecmis: You have neglected a situation related to your health in the past, saying 'it will pass anyway', and you have overtired your body. Maybe you focused only on your mental pain and ignored the physical symptoms, and that's why your body became weak. This state of 'neglect' you experienced at that time may have left you with a sensitivity even today and a tendency to get sick at the slightest stress. Back then, it seemed like you ignored your own body's needs just for the sake of other people's troubles.
saglik.simdi: You are currently in a state of 'burnout' and energy blockage regarding your health, honey; Your body can no longer handle this stress of 'keeping up with others'! You try to show yourself to be very compassionate on the outside, but inside your batteries are dead. Headaches, insomnia, or hormonal irregularities may be an expression of your current state of stress. These days, you should take time for yourself, get away from the crowds and let your body repair itself; The healing will only come back when you truly decide to 'stop'.
saglik.gelecek: The problems you may experience with your health in the future may generally be due to exhaustion caused by overexertion or internal diseases caused by repressed anger. If you don't regulate your lifestyle today and see saying 'no' as a success, your body may give you a much harsher 'stop' warning in the future. To be fitter in the future, you should create a healthy routine now and get rid of your mental burdens. Health stays with you only when you love yourself.

hepsi.gecmis: You left the great awakening and integrity that you should have experienced in a past period of your life incomplete because of your own fears or the troubles of others. While fate had just opened a door for you, you made a mistake or failed to carry that sacred glass. This feeling of 'unfinishedness' that you experienced at that time creates a feeling of 'incompleteness' in your entire life today. It's like you feel like your time is wasted and you're still waiting for someone on that old threshold.
hepsi.simdi: There is chaos in your life right now because you are trying to manage everything according to your emotions, but your logic warns you, dear; This is your biggest mistake. There are opportunities, but you fail to see them or take them seriously because of your 'victim' stubbornness. He should shake himself up as soon as possible, realize the blessings he has and ask 'who should I really walk with?' you should ask. If your perspective does not change, your life will not open a new door for you; You need to take that step of maturity.
hepsi.gelecek: What awaits you in the future may be a recurring fate of 'loneliness' and 'wasted opportunities' if you do not change your dissatisfied and dependent attitude. You can miss the tremendous good news that life offers you only because you cannot show that last seriousness. To save your future, you must put 'focus' and honesty back at the center of your life today. Otherwise, life may leave you with a much greater disappointment at a point you never wanted; be alert!
